name: Git
natural_language_description: 这是 Git 节点。主要用于: Control git.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: The way to authenticate | 默认值: none
available_options: Authenticate (值: gitPassword)
None (值: none)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: log
available_options: Add (值: add) - Add a file or folder to commit
Add Config (值: addConfig) - Add configuration property
Clone (值: clone) - Clone a repository
Commit (值: commit) - Commit files or folders to git
Fetch (值: fetch) - Fetch from remote repository
List Config (值: listConfig) - Return current configuration
Log (值: log) - Return git commit history
Pull (值: pull) - Pull from remote repository
Push (值: push) - Push to remote repository
Push Tags (值: pushTags) - Push Tags to remote repository
Status (值: status) - Return status of current repository
Switch Branch (值: switchBranch) - Switch to a different branch
Tag (值: tag) - Create a new tag
User Setup (值: userSetup) - Set the user

repositoryPath.name: repositoryPath
repositoryPath.description: Local path to which the git repository should be cloned into
repositoryPath.natural_language_description: 参数名: New Repository Path | 作用: Local path to which the git repository should be cloned into | (必填项)

pathsToAdd.name: pathsToAdd
pathsToAdd.description: Comma-separated list of paths (absolute or relative to Repository Path) of files or folders to add
pathsToAdd.natural_language_description: 参数名: Paths to Add | 作用: Comma-separated list of paths (absolute or relative to Repository Path) of files or folders to add | (必填项)

key.name: key
key.description: Name of the key to set
key.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key | 作用: Name of the key to set | (必填项)

value.name: value
value.description: Value of the key to set
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: Value of the key to set | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: createBranch (值: None) - Whether to create the branch if it does not exist
startPoint (值: None) - The commit/branch/tag to create the new branch from. If not set, creates from current HEAD.
force (值: None) - Whether to force the branch switch, discarding any local changes
setUpstream (值: None) - Whether to set up tracking to a remote branch when creating a new branch
remoteName (值: None) - The name of the remote to track

sourceRepository.name: sourceRepository
sourceRepository.description: The URL or path of the repository to clone
sourceRepository.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source Repository | 作用: The URL or path of the repository to clone | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: The commit message to use

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

branchName.name: branchName
branchName.description: The name of the branch to switch to
branchName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Branch Name | 作用: The name of the branch to switch to | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the tag to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the tag to create | (必填项)
